description: A blueprint for analyzing the key elements and content of an advertisement image.

Content_Moderation_Flags.instruction: Identify any potential issues or concerns related to the content of the advertisement, such as the presence of nudity, violence, or other sensitive material.

Age_Rating.instruction: Determine the appropriate age rating for the advertisement based on its content and messaging.

Regulatory_Compliance.instruction: Assess any regulatory or industry-specific compliance requirements that may apply to the advertisement, such as advertising standards or product claims.

Branding_Elements.instruction: Identify and extract all branding elements, logos, and text visible in the advertisement.

Advertising_Sequence.instruction: Describe the sequence or progression of visual elements that make up the overall advertisement.

Advertising_Theme.instruction: Determine the overall theme, message, or purpose conveyed by the advertisement.

Advertising_Techniques.instruction: Identify the key advertising techniques or strategies used in the advertisement, such as the use of humor, emotional appeals, informational content, celebrity endorsements, or product placement.

Compliance_Considerations.instruction: Assess any compliance-related aspects of the advertisement, such as content moderation, age-appropriateness, or regulatory requirements.
